headings: Gain in-depth knowledge about regional, national and international security issues that will prepare you to start or advance your career.
Admission Requirements, Degree Plan and Courses
What Can You Do With a Global Security Studies Degree?
Why Earn My Global Security Studies Master’s Degree at Angelo State?
paragraphs: The increasing complexity of international relations and national security issues is driving an ongoing demand for global security professionals.

Be part of the next generation of global security leaders by completing our nationally-recognized master of security studies degree. Our program is offered 100% online, and primary topics range from rogue states, terrorism and human rights to energy security and peacekeeping operations. We also offer in-depth Regional Studies classes covering all five key regions in the world.

Our faculty have professional experience in a wide variety of national and international security fields. They also stay up to date with current global security issues and regularly publish their award-winning research. Several are internationally recognized experts in their fields, and they are all dedicated to providing the best possible online learning experience.
Tuition & FeesWe don’t sacrifice quality for affordability. Angelo State is committed to helping you achieve your educational goals with as little debt as possible.

ASU Distinguished Graduate ScholarshipsEarn our premier graduate scholarship based on your highest degree GPA. Once you are admitted to an ASU graduate program, you will automatically be considered. No application is necessary.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.

When you earn your degree in global security studies, you can expect to start or advance your career in the military, international relations, federal law enforcement, civil service agencies, think tanks and nonprofit organizations.
Our program has been ranked No. 2 and the “Most Affordable” among the “Top 32 Online Master’s in Security Programs” in the U.S. by Intelligent.com.
Military students who useTuition Assistancewill automatically receive the Tuition Assistance Scholarship, making tuition free while attending the program.*
*Must submit a valid and correct Tuition Assistance Authorization Form to cover TA-approved courses.

Air Force students who are planning to apply for the Foreign Area Officer Program will be able to enhance their qualifications by completing a four-course sequence focused in the same geographical world region.

Whether you’re pursuing a master’s degree, doctoral degree or certificate/certification, you have access to all the services in ourCollege of Graduate Studies and Research. You’ll find information and resources for everything from registering for classes and writing a thesis – to available graduate/teaching assistantships and graduate research opportunities.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
